cz.petrkubes.ioweyou.Api

Class Api

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.petrkubes.ioweyou.Api.Api

  • public class Api
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling all http requests
    Author:
    Petr Kubes

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  Api.GetActions
      Downloads and saves actions
      private class  Api.GetCurrencies
      Downloads and saves currencies
      private class  Api.GetUser
      Downloads and saves info about the user
      private class  Api.Login
      Requires parameter jsonToSend to be set and it has to include facebook parameters Saves user's id and apiKey to the database
      private class  Api.UpdateDebts
      Sends debts to the server Downloads all most current debts Deletes all old debts and saves the new ones into the local database

    • Method Detail

      • download

        public void download(int type,
                     ApiParams params)
        Executes async task corresponding to selected type of request
        Parameters:
        type - type of request ex. API_GET_USER, API_LOGIN etc.
        params - parameters required by the task, usually contains a callback

      • updateDebtsAndActions

        private void updateDebtsAndActions(ApiParams params)
        Updated debts and actions
        Parameters:
        params - requires a callback

      • updateAll

        private void updateAll(ApiParams params)
        Updates everything
        Parameters:
        params - requires a callback

      • loginAndUpdateAll

        private void loginAndUpdateAll(ApiParams params)
        Logs user in and than executes function to update everything
        Parameters:
        params - requires a callback and facebook login json

      • getResult

        private ApiResult getResult(java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String method,
                            ApiParams params,
                            java.lang.String apiKey)
        method doing the actual web request the method does not run in a seperate thread, therefore must be executed only in a async task
        Parameters:
        address - url
        method - request type, ex. POST, GET
        params - parameters including JSON to be send to the server and a callback
        apiKey - key used for user authentication
        Returns:
        apiResult containing information about the request

      • isConnected

        private boolean isConnected()
        Checks if user is connected to wifi or has data connection enabled. Does not necessarily mean that the user has internet connection.
        Returns:
        bool
